class impresso_commons.utils.Timer¶

Basic timer

impresso_commons.utils.chunk(list, chunksize)¶

Yield successive n-sized chunks from list.

impresso_commons.utils.executetask(tasks, parallel_execution)¶

Effectively run execution of tasks

:param tasks : list of tasks to be executed :type tasks : xx :param parallel_execution : :type parallel_execution : boolean ?

impresso_commons.utils.init_logger(logger, log_level, log_file)¶

Initialise the logger.

impresso_commons.utils.timestamp()¶

Returns an iso-formatted timestamp.

Returns:a timestamp
Return type:str
impresso_commons.utils.user_confirmation(question, default=None)¶

Ask a yes/no question via raw_input() and return their answer.

@param question: a string that is presented to the user. @param default: the presumed answer if the user just hits <Enter>.

It must be “yes” (the default), “no” or None (meaning an answer is required of the user).

@return: True for “yes” or False for “no”.
